extendedInfo.description: Get all the Christian content and Bible education tools you need with the Amazing Facts app! The everlasting gospel of Jesus Christ will come alive as you explore gigabytes of information all at your fingertips.Itâs never been easier to access educational and inspirational sermons, daily devotionals, Bible studies, and more. Great for sharing on the go!Features include:â¢	Watch thousands of sermons featuring Pastor Doug Batchelor!â¢	Watch Central Study Hour in hi-def.âwith closed captioningâ¢	Download pastoral notes for the Central Study Hour broadcastâ¢	Watch Amazing Facts Presents, our flagship program televised around the worldâ¢	Listen to Bible Answers Live and get answers to the most difficult and controversial Bible questionsâ¢	Get access to our daily devotionals for spiritual refreshment every day!â¢	Read our popular Bible Study Guides and Storacles of Bible Prophecyâ¢	Explore our huge library of Christian topical pocket booksâ¢	Check out the latest posts on social media sites, such as Twitter and Facebookâ¢	Reliable Bible information on prophecy, Christian living and lifestyle, teachings of Jesus, Old Testament, New Testament, church, salvation, creation, life after death, sin, origins of evil, and so much more!Amazing Facts has been sharing the everlasting gospel around the globe for more than 45 years through television, radio, internet, publishing, Bible studies, training, and more! reviews.title: Love this app
reviews.comment: A friend introduced me to this app.  It\'s great I love it.  God has a useful took amidst all the bad things with technology.  I want to find something like this for parents.  We need help raising our children in this crazy world.  Thanks for this ministry.
reviews.author: Jamie Eck

reviews.title: The best app out there
reviews.comment: Great abundance of resources with practical guidance.  What would make it even better is if you created a search program that matched people that want to learn more about Jesus with people who want to teach more about Jesus. Keep up the good work!
reviews.author: Jane Smith

reviews.title: Nice App.
reviews.comment: I love to listen to Amazing Facts. Unfortunstely I was unable to open any of audio/video on my mobile. It states \'unsupported system\'. Any suggedtion?

reviews.title: If you ate seeking the light of Jesus Christ, this app is for YOU!
reviews.comment: Great bible truths and facts everyone should know. This also makes studying on the go more accessible. I love it.
